entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerside
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerside 06:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023
Temperature: -1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: NNE 37 km/h gust 51 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then mainly cloudy. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Clearing late this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 1.
